duties_responsibilities.duty: Process operating room instruments and sterilize and decontaminate instruments and supplies.
Assume responsibility for the department on weekends or in the absence of supervisory personnel.
Assist in Continuous Quality Improvement teamwork for departmental problem-solving activities.
Prepare and bag instruments for shipment and inspect and store items without compromising their integrity.
Test instruments for proper function and inspect and report defective/damaged instruments to the supervisor.
Prepare all types of scopes for sterilization, operate all equipment, and perform sterilizer monitoring with chemical and biological indicators.
Handle high-level disinfectants in a safe manner and clean and decontaminate all reusable items from patient areas following appropriate guidelines.
Ensure smooth workflow, determine work activities, and delegate work assignment to staff accordingly.

education_certification.credential: Certified Registered Central Service Technician (CRCST) by Healthcare Sterile Processing Association (HSPA), Certified Endoscope Reprocessor (CER), or Certified Flexible Endoscope Reprocessor (CFER).
